thread.title: Shweiki Media Printing Company Announces Sponsorship of 2015 Austin Film Festival
thread.title_full: Shweiki Media Printing Company Announces Sponsorship of 2015 Austin Film Festival - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Shweiki Media Printing Company Announces Sponsorship of 2015 Austin Film Festival
text:
Shweiki Media is excited to announce that they will once again be serving as the print sponsor of the Austin FIlm Festival and printing all materials for the event. The AFF is an annual festival and conference dedicated to recognizing writers' and filmmakers' contributions to media, and Shweiki is happy for the opportunity to contribute to the arts and give back to the Austin community by donating their printing services for such an awesome event.
Austin, TX (PRWEB) October 15, 2015
Shweiki Media Printing Company is excited to announce that this year they will once again be participating in the Austin Film Festival –the premier film festival recognizing writers’ and filmmakers’ contributions to film, television and new media–as the official print sponsor, and printing all materials for the event.
The Austin Film Festival and Conference takes place October 29- November 5 this year and will, according to the organization, "again showcase the very best that the city has to offer – convenient downtown venues, fun parties at Austin’s fine bars and restaurants, and community partnerships – while presenting an outstanding program of narrative, animation and documentary features and shorts, including premieres, advanced screenings, and independent films."
The festival prides itself on acknowledging writers' role in the film industry--to the point of being known as "The Writers Festival"--and through its many events, AFF hopes to shine the spotlight on both emerging and well-known talent within the space.
Tickets and badges are available for purchase by the public, and AFF encourages all Austinites to come out and witness the talent of locals and those who've come from all over the world.
More information, tickets and the full schedule for the festival and conference can be found at austinfilmfestival.com.
As a patron of the arts and an ongoing AFF supporter, Shweiki is happy to contribute to the event by providing their high-quality printing.
Shweiki Media’s mission has always been to help publishers improve by providing the most profitable, hassle-free printing experience possible. This includes guaranteeing the highest quality product, exceptional customer service, world-class communication, an on-time guarantee, and no surprises–whether printing magazines , postcards, flyers or anything else.
As a printer and publisher , Shweiki Media also believes that this hassle-free experience includes making their clients better. Utilizing relationships with industry experts, Shweiki Media strives to educate clients and help them thrive in the exciting world of publishing–while having lots of fun along the way!
For more great info from and about Shweiki Media, please check out our blog at shweiki.com/blog (and sign up for our FREE weekly expert webinars !), and subscribe to our Youtube Channel at youtube.com/shweikimedia. You can also follow us @ShweikiMedia and “like” us at Facebook.com/shweikimedia
 //www.prweb.com/releases/Shweiki-Media-Printing-Co/Austin-Film-Festival-2015/prweb13016211.htm
